item.title: GHG Is Now Open To The Communtiy!
item.description:
After developing GHG to the point where it is ready for production, we have opened it up to the community! This post explains more about it.

The Community Section

At the time of writing, basically all sections are open for community posts. Although, the dedicated community ones are polls and questions.

Requesting Games To Be Added

You can request a game to be added by sumbitting a request in Community/Game Requests

Rules

  • No innapropriate words/sentences/comments
  • No innapropriate games
  • Try to keep your grammar and spelling good
  • Minimum 50 words per article (WPA)
  • The same rules from any community apply to this one
  • No discrimination
    This is subject to change. We have no way of updating you when this happens easily.
